### Idiom: 敌国外患
### Meaning: 指来自敌对国家的侵略骚扰。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: cc-news
source: 无敌国外患者，国恒亡。创造假想敌，一直是美国维持强大军力的必要条件。
target: Invincible foreign patients, the country will perish. Creating imaginary enemies has always been a necessary condition for the United States to maintain strong military power.

### Idiom: 激浊扬清
### Meaning: 激冲去；浊脏水；清清水。冲去污水，让清水上来。比喻清除坏的，发扬好的。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 髫幼举家辗转播迁香港，钟爱艺文，淬琢砻砥，开启六十余载抱椠握铅之年岁。毕生投躯政治文化暨新闻执论，先后草创《伴侣》半月刊、《文艺伴侣》月刊、《九十年代》杂志，持秉激浊扬清宏旨，畅申时事评詙缕析；眷注台湾党外运动，推引香港九七浪潮，针砭建白，孤怀闳识；言诚理精，鲜明悠远。平素专务散文、新诗、小品文写作，志切两岸三地现况，悉力政经局势发展；践履民主法治真义，捍卫自由人权保障，蚊思负山，自出胸臆。
target: When a child, the family moved to Hong Kong, he took up the art of writing, and developed a sharp pencil hand. He spent his life giving his voice to political and news writing, starting a sixty-year cycle of exposure to the pen. He has been writing essays, new poetry, short stories, and articles for the past sixty years.

### Idiom: 风高放火，月黑杀人
### Meaning: 风高风非常大。月黑指黑夜。趁风大放火，趁黑夜杀人。形容盗匪趁机作案的行径。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: web
source: 风高放火，月黑杀人，这似乎是“遇盗”的典型环境；此处却不经意地点染出在潇潇暮雨笼罩下一片静谧的江村。
target: The wind is high, setting fires, and the moon is dark, killing people. This seems to be a typical environment for "encountering a robbery"; here, however, the quiet Jiangcun shrouded in the Xiaoxiao dusk rain is inadvertently revealed.

context:
### Idiom: 救人一命，胜造七级浮屠
### Meaning: 指救人性命功德无量。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: web
source: 热恋开始，我真的不想离开她，但是马海波却不断催我，说吴刚的病情耽误不得，要能去，尽快去一趟吧，救人一命，胜造七级浮屠呢？是不是，像你们这个行当的，不就是讲究一个善有善报、恶有恶报么？我被这个马唐僧给唠叨得实在受不了了，于是回了趟家，简单收拾了行李，准备于正月十三乘飞机，离开晋平。
target: When we started to fall in love, I really didn’t want to leave her, but Ma Haibo kept urging me, saying that Wu Gang’s condition could not be delayed, and if I could go, I should go as soon as possible. Saving a life is better than building a seven-level pagoda? Isn’t it true that in your profession, people in your profession follow the principle that good will be rewarded with good and evil will be punished with evil? I couldn't stand being nagged by this Monk Ma, so I went back home, simply packed my luggage, and prepared to take a flight to leave Jinping on the 13th of the first lunar month.

### Idiom: 有教无类
### Meaning: 类：类别。不管什么人都可以受到教育。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: cc-news
source: 佛光山开山宗长星云大师 在二○二三年二月五日圆寂，享年九十七岁。当时华文媒体天天都报导他春风化雨、有教无类的人生。不觉忆起，在九○年初有数年和星云大师面对面接触之缘。
target: Venerable Master Sheng Yen, the founder of Fo Guang Shan, passed away on February 5, 2023 at the age of 97. At that time, the Chinese-language media reported his life story of spring rain and snow, and how he was a person of great virtue. I was unaware of this, but I had the good fortune to meet Venerable Master Sheng Yen face to face for several years in the early 1990s.

### Idiom: 阮囊羞涩
### Meaning: 阮囊亚代阮孚的钱袋；羞涩难为情。比喻经济困难。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: cc-news
source: 自己没公职，又被当作民进党‘弃儿’、屡被‘小英门生’打压，支持者为他抱屈，但是反而可以让他接触更多蓝营或中间选民，在蓝大于绿的台东是个助力。赖坤成表示，立委初选的登记费高达75万元，最近辞官没收入、股票又套牢，阮囊羞涩，不好对外募款，企业界朋友也都不看好，家人更强烈反对，然而一股寻求在台东最后一战的强烈意愿趋势著他排除万难毅然决定投入，有信心自己一辈子累积的各领域经验、丰沛人脉、自然幽默的问政风格可以丰富台东未来4年，让台东很热闹、让国会很轻松。刘櫂豪则在脸书表示，虽然结果不如预期，也感到意外，仍然秉持正面团队的态度，尊重初选结果。
target: He has no public office, and is regarded as a “deserted child” of the Democratic Progressive Party (DPP), and is repeatedly suppressed by “small English”; his supporters feel wronged, but on the other hand, it can allow him to be in contact with more blue camp or centrist voters, and in the blue-greener Taiwan East, it is a help. Liao Kun-cheng said that the registration fee for the primary election of the National Assembly is as high as NT$7.5 million, and he has recently resigned from his office and lost his income, and his stocks are trapped. Wen Ning-xi is shy, and it is difficult to go out to raise funds, and the business circle friends also do not look good, and his family is strongly opposed, but there is a strong trend of seeking the last battle in Taiwan East. He believes that his lifelong experience in all fields, abundant social relations, and his humorous questioning style can enrich the future of Taiwan East for four years, and make Taiwan East very lively and the National Assembly very easy. Liu Lu-hao said on Facebook that he was surprised by the results, although they were not as expected, and still adhere to the positive team attitude, respecting the results of the primary election.

### Meaning: 艰深文辞深奥难懂；晦涩意义隐晦，不顺口。形容笔调深僻、寓意难以理解的文章。

target: Hobbes was right in saying that asceticism is nothing but the condition of enduring the dictatorship of oppression.

### Idiom: 白眼相看
### Meaning: 看别人时眼睛朝上或旁边，现出白眼珠，表示轻蔑，不屑一顾，对人不礼貌。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: weibo
source: 【平常语·甘露味】不要怪生活有时候会故意拉长了脸，冷嘲热讽，白眼相看。生活真的想给机会让你明白，这世间风一阵雨一阵，烦恼一直有去有来，旧的放下，新的又捡起，没有什么能一直存在。
target: 【Everyday Speech·Sweet Dew】Don't blame life for intentionally stretching its face, making sarcastic comments, and rolling its eyes at you sometimes. Life really wants to give you a chance to understand that this world has winds and rains, troubles always come and go, the old are let go and the new are picked up, and nothing can exist forever.

### Idiom: 烘云托月
### Meaning: 烘渲染；托衬托。原指一种画月亮的传统手法◇比喻从侧面渲染以显示或突出主体。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 如这幅画，他用泼墨画出行云，烘云托月，不仅破掉了平板，而且使松梅月石贯联一气，既加强了画面的疏密变化和整体感，又使其变化中有统一，统一中有变化，并使画面气势倍增。
target: For example, in such a painting, he used splatter painting to draw clouds, and to make the clouds and the moon appear to be floating in the air, not only breaking the flatness, but also making the pine-meat moon stone connected in one breath, thus enhancing the changes in the picture and the overall feeling, and making the changes in the picture unified and the changes in the picture unified, and making the picture full of momentum.

### Meaning: ①形容被火烧伤得很严重。②指牺牲惨重。③喻处境狼狈或十分窘迫。

### Idiom: 随波逐尘
### Meaning: 犹言随波逐流。比喻没有坚定的立场，缺乏判断是非的能力，只能随着别人走。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: weibo
source: 常因奇装异服饱受诟病。穿个衣服都要考虑别人的感受，只会人云亦云，随波逐尘，泯然众人。穿衣审美哪有标准，得体就行。
target: People are often criticized for their strange and unconventional outfits. Wearing clothes is not just about considering your own feelings, but also about following the crowd and losing your individuality. There is no standard for clothing aesthetics, as long as it is appropriate.

### Idiom: 筋疲力尽
### Meaning: 筋肉疲乏，体力竭尽。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: cc-news
source: 这是他对这张专辑最直接的自评。‘今后直到筋疲力尽为止，都会这样持续记录“日记”吧……’坂本龙一已然接受了自己的命运，预感到了终曲的脚步已近。另外，就是去年12月11日在全球网络播出的钢琴独奏会，这是坂本龙一的最后一场亲自演奏的公开演出，许多乐迷都被当时演出画面中教授消瘦苍白的脸庞所震惊，看哭了无数人。
target: This is his most direct self-evaluation of this album. 'From now on, I will continue to keep a "diary" like this until I am exhausted...' Sakamoto Ryuichi had already accepted his fate and had a premonition that the finale was approaching. In addition, the piano recital broadcast on the global network on December 11 last year was Sakamoto Ryuichi's last public performance in person. Many music fans were shocked by the professor's thin and pale face in the performance. I saw countless people crying.

### Idiom: 晓风残月
### Meaning: 拂晓风起，残月将落。常形容冷落凄凉的意境。也指歌妓的清唱。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 与樊樊山、朱祖谋、况周颐称清季“四大词宗”。俞樾评文卓的词：“豪宕之中兼以细腻，合大江东去、晓风残月为一手”。又精于音律。
target: Together with Fan Fanshan, Zhu Zumou and Kuang Zhouyi, they were called the "four major Ci schools" in the Qing Dynasty. Yu Yue commented on Wenzhuo's words: "Delicacy is combined with the generosity, and the great river goes eastward, and the dawn wind and the waning moon are one hand." He is also good at music.

context:
### Idiom: 竖起脊梁
### Meaning: 比喻振作精神。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 佛图关南面石壁上还有历代题刻，惟清朝前的十余处刻字多已风化而无法辨识，现在保留的多为晚清、民国期间的题刻，内容多是如《佛图关铭》《佛图关》《清正廉明》《西枕双江》《恩周存殁》《廉明慈爱》等功德、节孝碑铭或一些警句。其中，“佛图关”题字约1米见方，落款“光绪壬申四月”（1882年），为题刻中唯一的阳刻；“学成须报国，临难且忘家”题字据传为冯玉祥所书；“挺起胸膛，竖起脊梁”为蒋介石所书，高2.07米，宽约1.5米，现因山体加固仅可见后4字。2022年，渝中区对部分石刻进行了修复。
target: On the south-facing rock wall of Fotuguan, there are inscriptions from various dynasties. However, more than ten inscriptions from before the Qing Dynasty have been weathered and are no longer recognizable. Most of the inscriptions that remain are from the late Qing Dynasty and the Republic of China period. The content mainly includes merit and filial piety inscriptions like "Fotuguan Inscription", "Fotuguan", "Pure, Upright, and Honest", "West Pillow Double River", "Gratitude for Zhou's Life and Death", "Honesty and Love", and other admonitions. Among them, the inscription "Fotuguan" is approximately 1 square meter, signed "April of the Ren Shen year of Guangxu" (1882), and is the only positive carving among the inscriptions. The inscription "Learning must serve the country, forget the family when facing difficulties" is said to be written by Feng Yuxiang; "Stand tall, straighten your spine" was written by Chiang Kai-shek, with a height of 2.07 meters and a width of about 1.5 meters. Now, due to mountain reinforcement, only the last four characters are visible. In 2022, the Yuzhong District carried out restoration work on some of the stone inscriptions.

context:
### Idiom: 听而不闻
### Meaning: ①《礼记·大学》：“心不在焉，视而不见，听而不闻，食而不知其味。”后以“听而不闻”谓听了与没听见一样，形容不重视或漠不关心。②谓听力有限，不闻声响。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 2022年4月24日，华视新闻资讯台《华视午间新闻》被爆废公社率先揭发，报导《美丽岛电子报》调查中华民国总统蔡英文施政满意度56%新闻，图卡将行政院院长苏贞昌职衔误植为“总统”；同日，华视发布道歉启事，表示“因制图同仁疏失”而将苏贞昌职衔误植为“总统”，并向观众致歉。中国国民党立法委员李德维批评，民主进步党遇到自己人出事，就视而不见、听而不闻；NCC变成瞎子与聋子，如同面对镜电视，沦为民进党附属机构。2022年4月25日，监察委员赖鼎铭、叶宜津、林郁容联合新闻稿指出，华视新闻资讯台字幕跑马灯多次发布不实新闻，造成社会不安；本案是单纯标准作业程序（SOP）疏失或其他系统性、结构性问题，文化部与NCC有无善尽督导之责，三人已申请自动调查。
target: On April 24, 2022, it was reported by废公社 that the "Huashetv Midday News" on Huashetv News and Information Channel revealed that the "Beautiful Island Electronic Newsletter" had conducted a survey of President Tsai Ing-wen's approval rating in the Republic of China, and that the title card had mistakenly labeled the Premier as "President". On the same day, Huashetv issued an apology, stating that "due to the negligence of map-making colleagues," the title card had mistakenly labeled the Premier as "President" and apologized to the audience. Legislative Yuan member Li De-wei of the Democratic Progressive Party criticized that when their own people were involved, they turned a blind eye and deaf ear, and that the NCC had become blind and deaf, like a mirror TV facing the public, and had become an affiliated agency of the Democratic Progressive Party. On April 25, 2022, Supervisory Committee members Lai Ding-ming, Ye Yi-jin, and Lin Yu-jung jointly issued a press release stating that the Huashetv News and Information Channel's ticker had repeatedly released false news, causing social unrest. This case was simply due to a failure in standard operating procedures (SOP) or other systemic and structural issues, and whether the Ministry of Culture and the NCC had fulfilled their supervisory responsibilities was under investigation by the three.

### Idiom: 生吞活剥
### Meaning: ①比喻生硬地抄袭或模仿。语本唐刘肃《大唐新语·谐谑》：“李义府尝赋诗曰：‘镂月成歌扇，裁云作舞衣。自怜回雪影，好取洛川归。’有枣强尉张怀庆好偷名士文章，乃为诗曰：‘生情镂月成歌扇，出意裁云作舞衣。照镜自怜回雪影，时来好取洛川归。’人谓之谚曰：‘活剥王昌龄，生吞郭正一。’”②谓不加烹调。③比喻侵略欺凌。④又作：生拉硬扯。⑤比喻一知半解。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: cc-news
source: 近日大陆山东威海一处动物园上演惊恐一幕，有民众亲眼目睹栅栏中白虎将一只孔雀‘生吞活剥’吃掉，地上满是羽毛，吓坏现场一票游客，对此园方表示园内散养上千只孔雀，可能不小心误闯，老虎吃孔雀是首次发生，但看见了也没法让老虎松口。游客王女士向《河北日报》表示，8日前往西霞口神雕山野生动物世界游玩，先是看到白虎旁散落一地孔雀羽毛，再定睛仔细瞧，赫然发现老虎正在撕咬孔雀，这才拿起手机拍下过程，直击整只孔雀被活生生吃掉，让她惊呼是‘真正的野生动物园’。
target: Recently, a terrifying scene unfolded at a zoo in Weihai, Shandong, mainland China, where a white tiger was witnessed by the public devouring a live peacock within its enclosure. The ground was covered with feathers, frightening many visitors on site. The zoo stated that there are thousands of peacocks roaming freely in the park and one may have accidentally wandered into the tiger's enclosure. This is the first time a tiger has been seen eating a peacock, but there was no way to make the tiger let go once it had started. A visitor, Ms. Wang, told the "Hebei Daily" that she initially saw peacock feathers scattered near the white tiger. Upon closer inspection, she was shocked to discover the tiger tearing into the peacock. She quickly took out her phone and recorded the entire process of the peacock being eaten alive, exclaiming that it was a "real wildlife park".

### Meaning: 清廉正直的风尚，高尚峻伟的气节。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: web
source: 目睹儿子面露愧色，母亲接着说，“你们要牢记父亲生前的教诲，恪守‘清慎勤’的为官之道，永葆清风峻节，尤其不能滋长一丝一毫的贪欲！”
target: When her son looked ashamed, the mother continued, "You must remember your father's advice, hold to the "Clean-Hard" way of being a civil servant, always remain clean, and especially not to develop any desire for anything!"

### Idiom: 虚情假意
### Meaning: 用虚假的情意待人；虚假的情意。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 在之后的日子，东对怡作出体贴的照顾，令怡爱上东，东也爱上怡。另外，财其实是一个虚情假意的骗子，他为了遗嘱，常想怡快一点死...。
target: In the later days, Dong made careful care of Yi and Yi fell in love with Dong. In addition, Cai is actually a phony and he often thinks that Yi should die as soon as possible.

### Meaning: 形容娇媚的微笑。

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: cc-news
source: ’‘我们邻居呀。’她嫣然一笑，朝阿婆指指手：‘还是她家的好吃。
target: "We are neighbors," she smiled and pointed at her grandmother, "even hers tastes better."

### Idiom: 生死攸关
### Meaning: 谓关系到生存或死亡。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: web
source: 当疯狂的战役机终究刹住车的时候，距离身旁的那架客机只有约9米远。由于机身携带有易燃的外挂油箱和2枚激光制导的导弹，起火的飞机随时可能产生剧烈爆炸！生死攸关之际，他按下了“太空时期”火箭弹射椅的按钮。多年的飞行经验告知他，现在已到了人机分离的决策临界点。
target: When the mad fighter finally braked, it was only about 9 meters away from the passenger plane beside it. Because the fuselage carried flammable drop tanks and two laser-guided missiles, the burning aircraft could explode violently at any time! At a critical moment of life and death, he pressed the button of the "Space Age" rocket ejection seat. Years of flying experience told him that it was now at the critical point of the decision to separate man and machine.

### Idiom: 此处不留人，自有留人处
### Meaning: 指这里不可居留，自会有可居留的地方。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: cc-news
source: 只是部份民宿业者，好像并不怕这一招，比起五一的盈利，这点罚金太小意思了。再者，平台繁多，此处不留人，自有留人处，对于这类无良民宿，仅靠平台按现行规则管制，并不足以纠偏。有内媒评论指出，今次民宿乱象已超出了行业管理的上限，需要法律及时亮剑。
target: But some B&B owners seem not to be afraid of this, and a small fine is nothing compared to the profits made on the 5th of May. Also, a lot of places where you don't stay, there are places where you can stay. For such unwanted B&Bs, it is not enough to just control them by the current rules of the platform. Some inland media commented that this B&B abuse has gone beyond the bounds of industry management, it is time for the law to get on the action.

### Idiom: 老奸巨猾
### Meaning: 指阅历很深，老于世故，而手段又极其奸诈狡猾者。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: web
source: 费利一见记者，就大夸俄罗斯这次冬奥会的组织工作出色，运营能力高强。“老奸巨猾”的费利马上意识到“越位”了，立刻予以回应：“首先，我必须声明，关于国际奥委会最终对索契的评价以巴赫主席在闭幕式上说的为准。”费利介绍，国际奥委会特地广泛征询了运动员的意见，反馈的意见是评价很好，运动员们对住宿、饮食、场馆、比赛和氛围都交口称赞，尤其是俄罗斯观众不只为主队加油，也为其他客队鼓掌。
target: On seeing the journalists, Valery FIKI immediately praised the excellent organization and high operating capability of the Russian Winter Olympics. "The wily old fox" Valery FIKI quickly realized that he had "overstepped the mark" and immediately responded: "First of all, I must state that the final evaluation of Sochi by the IOC will be determined by what President Bach says at the closing ceremony." Valery FIKI introduced that the IOC had specially solicited the opinions of athletes, and the feedback was very positive. The athletes praised the accommodation, catering, venues, competitions and atmosphere, especially the Russian spectators who cheered not only for their own team, but also for other visiting teams.

context:
### Idiom: 话里有刺
### Meaning: 指话中包含着讥笑和讽刺。同话中带刺”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 觉得话里有刺，吴荪甫勉强笑了一笑；他现在觉得这位年青人固然可赞，却也有几分可怕，同时却也自惭为什么这样的人放在厂里两年之久却一向没有留意到。
target: Wu Xingfu forced a smile at the sting in the words, but he now thought that the young man was both commendable and frightening, and he also felt embarrassed why this kind of person had been in the factory for two years but had never been noticed.

### Meaning: 比喻无真正的才干而混在行家里面充数的人。同滥竽充数”。

source: 宣王死后，齐湣王立。湣王喜欢一个一个地听他们吹竽，南郭处士便逃跑了。
target: After the death of Xuan Wang, Qi Min Wang took the throne. Min Wang liked to listen to them play one by one, so Nan Guo Chu Shi ran away.

### Idiom: 唯妙唯肖
### Meaning: 形容描写或模仿得非常巧妙，非常逼真。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: cc-news
source: 你今天问AI了吗？这段时间chat GPT席卷了我们的生活，其实AI技术发展许久，突然如火山迸发于日常后，我们才发现，原来AI技术已经如此成熟。你还记得已逝歌手邓丽君‘惊喜现身’、在舞台上与周杰伦高歌的景象吗？唯妙唯肖的神韵让人十足赞叹，也纷纷好奇到底是怎么办到的？原来这项惊人的成果出自好莱坞知名视效公司数字王国Digital Domain之手，而背后领军的人竟是正港的台湾囝仔。好莱坞电影的幕后推手，精彩视效成就时代经典。
target: Have you asked AI today? In recent times, chat GPT has swept our lives. In fact, AI technology has developed for a long time, and suddenly after erupting like a volcano into our daily lives, we realize that AI technology has already become so mature. Do you still remember the scene of the late singer Teresa Teng 'surprisingly appearing' on stage and singing with Jay Chou? The exquisite nuance left people full of admiration, and they were all curious about how it was done. It turned out that this amazing achievement was created by the well-known Hollywood visual effects company Digital Domain, and the person leading the way behind the scenes was actually a real Taiwanese boy. Behind the scenes of Hollywood movies, stunning visual effects have achieved classic works of the era.

### Meaning: 指阅历很深，老于世故，而手段又极其奸诈狡猾者。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: web
source: 费利一见记者，就大夸俄罗斯这次冬奥会的组织工作出色，运营能力高强。“老奸巨猾”的费利马上意识到“越位”了，立刻予以回应：“首先，我必须声明，关于国际奥委会最终对索契的评价以巴赫主席在闭幕式上说的为准。”费利介绍，国际奥委会特地广泛征询了运动员的意见，反馈的意见是评价很好，运动员们对住宿、饮食、场馆、比赛和氛围都交口称赞，尤其是俄罗斯观众不只为主队加油，也为其他客队鼓掌。
target: As soon as Feili saw the reporters, he highly praised Russia's outstanding organization and strong operational capabilities for this Winter Olympics. The "cunning and crafty" Feili immediately realized he had "overstepped" and quickly responded: "First of all, I must declare that the final evaluation of Sochi by the International Olympic Committee is based on what President Bach said at the closing ceremony." Feili explained that the International Olympic Committee specifically sought extensive feedback from the athletes. The feedback was very positive, with athletes praising the accommodation, food, venues, competitions, and atmosphere. Especially noteworthy was that the Russian spectators not only cheered for the home team, but also applauded the other visiting teams.
